resources.string: Find latest films and TV shows right here.
Request films and web series here.

1. Click on the download here button. 
2. You will be directed to the Google Drive on your phone. 
3. Tap on 3 dots of the episode/quality of the content you wanna download. 
4. Click on download. 
5. It will start downloading. You can see in the notifications.

Note: You can copy link simply by long press on Download here button.
